hero.title: AgriTech
hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing Dominican agriculture with artificial intelligence
hero.description: The first comprehensive platform that combines artificial intelligence, IoT sensors and predictive analytics to optimize agricultural production, reduce environmental impact and empower farmers with cutting-edge technological tools.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Transform Dominican agriculture by democratizing access to intelligent technologies, reducing the digital gap between traditional farmers and advanced technological solutions of the 21st century.

stats.label: Small producers represent the national productive system
Increase in productivity with digital technologies (FAO)

items.title: AI Analysis
items.description: Intelligent processing of agricultural PDF documents with automatic summaries, key data extraction and personalized recommendations based on analyzed content.

items.title: Specialized Chat
items.description: Conversational assistant expert in Dominican agriculture that understands local context, native crop varieties and specific climatic conditions of the country.

items.title: IoT Monitoring
items.description: Integration with EcoWitt sensors for real-time monitoring of temperature, humidity, atmospheric pressure, wind speed, UV radiation and precipitation.

items.title: Intelligent Prediction
items.description: Machine learning algorithms that analyze climatic patterns, predict pests and diseases, and optimize the use of resources like water and fertilizers.

items.title: Precision Agriculture
items.description: Tools for crop mapping, soil spatial variability analysis and specific recommendations by zone within the agricultural plot.

items.title: Sustainable Management
items.description: Optimization of agricultural input use to reduce environmental impact, minimize waste and promote regenerative agriculture practices.

groups.title: Small Farmers
groups.description: Intuitive and accessible tools that don't require advanced technical knowledge. Simplified interface with clear and practical recommendations to improve productivity without large investments.
benefits: Access to technology without prohibitive costs

groups.title: Agricultural Students
groups.description: Educational platform that complements academic training with practical tools, real case studies and access to the latest innovations in smart agriculture.
benefits: Preparation for the agriculture of the future

groups.title: Technology Enthusiasts
groups.description: Full access to APIs, real-time data and advanced tools for developers interested in creating custom solutions for the agricultural sector.

impact.title: Expected Impact
impact.subtitle: Transforming Dominican agriculture
impact.description: Based on international studies and similar projects like AgAID in the United States and Agro360 at regional level, AgriTech seeks to generate measurable impact on agricultural productivity and sustainability.

metrics.title: Input Reduction

metrics.title: Water Savings
metrics.description: Irrigation optimization based on soil moisture data and climate predictions

metrics.title: Early Detection

ecowitt.title: EcoWitt Sensor Technology
ecowitt.subtitle: World leaders in IoT weather stations
ecowitt.description: AgriTech integrates advanced sensors and weather stations from EcoWitt, a leading company in environmental monitoring technology. We use their high-precision products to obtain real-time weather and environmental data.
ecowitt.disclaimer: Important note: AgriTech uses EcoWitt products for environmental data monitoring, but we do not maintain an official commercial collaboration with the company. We are independent users of their technology.

features.title: Complete Weather Stations
features.description: 7-in-1 sensors that measure temperature, humidity, pressure, wind, rain, UV and solar radiation

features.title: Wi-Fi and RF Connectivity
features.description: Wireless data transmission up to 100 meters distance with solar battery backup

features.title: Specialized Sensors
features.description: Soil moisture monitors, air quality, leak detectors and water tank sensors

features.title: Professional Precision
features.description: Laboratory precision instruments designed for agriculture, meteorology and research
